Name: Now you are the persecuted
About the game: You spawn in a dungeon that hasn't loaded yet and for some reason the other enemies (apart from you) want to attack you and you have to escape before they reach you (there could be many bugs) This is a random level generator game where there are more and more enemies with the level number You as a player need to find a white door on the level to scape from the dungeon and the monsters on it Everytime you enter one door, another enemy will appear on the level You don't fight, you don't pick objects, you just RUN to survive - I had the idea of putting together many of the things that I had already learned with my previous games and a project that I had the idea of doing, an escape dungeon that although you can't attack it is still fun to run and dash around the map
